chunks.content:
Full name
: Van Thi Xuan Trang
Date of birth
: 18/02/1989
Address
: Huynh Tan Phat Street, Phu My Ward,
District 7, Ho Chi Minh City
Mobile :
Email :

- GLYPH<1> 02/2024  -  06/2024: Certificate  in  Bakery  &  Pastry  skills  at  AZ  Career  &  Training  Academy  in Vietnam (Affiliated with LA XENIA - International Institute of Switzerland).
- GLYPH<1> 07/2024 - 08/2024: Pastry trainee at Novotel Living Saigon South (4 star)
- GLYPH<1> 08/2024 - 09/2024: Pastry trainee at Premier Village Phu Quoc Resort (5 star) include 215 villas with private swimming pool

- GLYPH<1> Communication is an essential skill for a commis chef. I frequently communicate with other kitchen staff, such as a pastry chef, sous chef as well as other commis.
- GLYPH<1> Attention to detail is a crucial skill, as it ensures the quality of the food. As a commis chef, I also have strong attention to detail to ensure chefs follow the recipe correctly and prepare the dessert properly.
- GLYPH<1> Teamwork: In the kitchen,  I  always  work  with  a  team  of  cooks  to  prepare  and  serve  desserts  to customers. My ability to work with others can help me to complete tasks more efficiently and to learn from others' expertise.
- GLYPH<1> Flexible, caring, open-minded, enthusiastic and responsible: Being able to change my approach to tasks and being willing to learn new skills.

08/2023 to 02/2024: The Adora Premium at Phu My Hung - 803 Nguyen Van Linh, Tan Phu Ward, District 7
(a part of the Adora System - The largest and most prestigious wedding and convention center in Ho Chi Minh City)

- -Washes, chops, and cuts fruit and vegetable items
- -Check inventory and requests resupply when necessary
- -Plates meal items under the chef de partie's supervision
-   Disposes of spoiled items and adheres to sanitation policies
- -Measures, mixes, and prepares meal ingredients, sauces, and seasonings
- -Continually develops culinary knowledge to produce high-quality meals.

metadata.section: 02/2023 to 07/2023: ICON SAIGON - 65 Hai Ba Trung Street, District 1, HCM (4 Stars Hotel) Position: Commis
